com.mygdx.game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Player class instantiates once per play session. It creates its own body. It keeps track of and manages the projectiles it shoots. to facilitate their deletion.
    Author:
    Sean Aubrey, Gabriel Fountain, Brandon Conn

      • velocityCap

        private com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 velocityCap(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 currentV)
        For every render, detects if directional velocity is greater than the maximum velocity and sets it at the max. Check again maximum ratios of the max velocity given the current ratio of velocities
        Parameters:
        currentV - current velocity
        Returns:
        v
